attributes.action: Make Friday 13th July a National Holiday so people can attend the Trump Protests
attributes.background: Britain has a long history of challenging Misogyny and Bigotry, and we want the world to see how far we've come. We have the right to attend a protest of the biggest perpetrator of these in the World and want to stand united against this with the American majority.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for facilitating protests.
